experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.subtitle: Self-employed
experiences.workDescription: Embarking on a self-employment journey as a Full Stack Developer, I am dedicated to delivering end-to-end web solutions for diverse client needs. With expertise in both front-end and back-end technologies, I design and implement user-centric interfaces, robust server-side applications, and scalable databases.

experiences.title: Frontend Developer
experiences.subtitle: Geizhals.at
experiences.workDescription: At Geizhals, a leading Austrian and German price comparison platform, I collaborated closely within a 5-person development team to both launch new projects from scratch and refactor legacy code using modern frameworks. I implemented dark mode, established an automated testing suite with Cypress, and rebuilt parts of the app with React, Svelte, and SvelteKit. Additionally, I contributed to developing the mobile app with Flutter, ensuring a seamless user experience across devices.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.subtitle: WoMentor
experiences.workDescription: Led the development of a mobile-first app using Next.js, designed a user-friendly UI from client wireframes, built a secure backend with PostgreSQL, implemented authentication, and created a matching algorithm for mentor-mentee pairing, also managed deployment and maintenance to ensure ongoing stability and mission alignment.

experiences.title: Web Development Bootcamp Student
experiences.subtitle: UpLeveled
experiences.workDescription: Developed multiple smaller projects and two larger ones: an e-commerce shop and a final project, eco challenge app.
